name: 孔繁傑
objective:
This course introduces the applications of digital signal processing on speech signals. It contains the following topics:
1. The characteristic of speech signal
2. Single-channel speech enhancement algorithms
3. Multichannel speech enhancement algorithms
4. Speech recognition techniques
5. Speech counting estimation
6. Speech localization methods
7. Deep-learning techniques on speech signals
schedule:
Week 1. Introduction of speech signals
Week 2-6. Single-channel speech enhancement algorithms
Week 7-12: Multichannel speech enhancement algorithms
Week 13-14: Speech recognition techniques
Week 15: Speech counting estimation
Week 16: Speech localization methods 
Week 17: Deep-learning techniques on speech signals
Week 18: Final presentation
materials:
1. C. P. Loizou, Speech Enhancement: Theory and Practice, Second Edition. CRC Press, 2013
2. M. R. Bai, J.-G. Ih, and J. Benesty, Acoustic Array Systems: Theory, Implementation, and Application. Wiley, 2013
3. A. V. Oppenheim and R. W. Schafer, Discrete-Time Signal Processing, Third Edition. PEARSON, 2010
4. Related paper for speech signal processing
5. Self-made PPT & notes
consultation: 1. You can email me (fjkung@ntut.edu.tw) or the TA.2. You can visit me (綜科 518) during office hours to discuss questions.
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG4：優質教育（Quality Education）SDG9：產業創新與基礎設施（Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure）
remarks: 有修習過訊號與系統，機率和線性代數者佳 (prerequisite knowledge: signal and systems, probability, and linear algebra)
